title: Multimedia-Based English Learning Tools Utilization Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of English language education and practical teaching experience in secondary education settings
context.additional_context: Intensive exploration of digital tool design and implementation methods for English language learning, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers. Project-based assessment producing classroom-ready instructional designs

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core features of multimedia-based English learning tools and explain how to integrate them into lesson design.
Learners can suggest three or more strategies to enhance learner engagement and self-efficacy in mobile microlearning environments.
Through project-based assessment, learners can design math-integrated English learning modules and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
